forms.noticeToPayRentOrQuit: Notice to Pay Rent or Quit

payments.monthlyDetails: Set up a recurring monthly charge for your tenant.
payments.monthlyInfo: This charge will be billed every month for the selected period.
payments.monthlyDisclaimer: Please review the charge details before submitting.
payments.monthlyChargeInfo1: This is a monthly recurring charge.
payments.monthlyChargeInfo2: You can set a start and end date.
payments.dailyDetails: Set up a recurring daily charge for your tenant.
payments.dailyInfo: This charge will be billed every day for the selected period.
payments.dailyDisclaimer: Please review the charge details before submitting.
payments.dailyChargeInfo1: This is a daily recurring charge.
payments.dailyChargeInfo2: You can set a maximum number of days.
payments.oneTimeDetails: Set up a one-time charge for your tenant.
payments.oneTimeInfo: This is a single, non-recurring charge.
payments.oneTimeDisclaimer: Please review the charge details before submitting.
payments.oneTimeChargeInfo2: You can set a due date.
payments.oneTimeChargeInfo3: Select a bank account for payment.

maintenance.createRequestDescription: Fill out the form to request maintenance for your property.
maintenance.issueTitleMin: Issue title must be at least 5 characters
maintenance.issueTitleMax: Issue title must be at most 50 characters
maintenance.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the maintenance issue in detail
maintenance.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters
maintenance.descriptionHelper: Please provide as much detail as possible.
maintenance.photosHelper: Upload up to 3 photos of the issue

leases.addLeaseDetailsDescription: Fill out the form to add basic lease details.
leases.leaseNicknameHelper: Give your lease a nickname for easy reference.
leases.fileSize: File size must be less than 5MB
leases.createLeaseAgreementDescription: Stay compliant with Veorent lease agreements.
leases.storeLeaseDocumentDescription: Stay organized by storing all lease documents in one place.
leases.createLeaseAddendumDescription: Fill out the form to create a lease addendum.
leases.addendumReasonsTitle: The most common reasons for using an addendum are:
leases.originalLeaseDateQuestion: When was the original lease agreement dated?
leases.endDateChangeQuestion: Will there be a change to the lease agreement end date?
leases.monthlyRentChangeQuestion: Will there be a change to the monthly rent amount?
leases.depositChangeQuestion: Will there be a change to any deposit amount?
leases.otherAmendmentsQuestion: Will there be other amendments to the original lease agreement terms?
leases.effectiveDateQuestion: When does this addendum take effect?
leases.selectLeaseAgreementTitle: Select Which Lease Needs an Agreement
leases.leaseSpecificDescription: We automatically filled information we had on file. Please double check it since it will go into the legal agreement.
leases.leaseTermQuestion: What is the term for this lease?
leases.peopleOnLeaseDescription: Add all parties to be included on the lease agreement.
leases.peopleOnLeaseInfoTitle: Here's what you need to know:
leases.peopleOnLeaseInfo1: All tenants must be listed on the lease.
leases.peopleOnLeaseInfo2: Each tenant is responsible for the lease terms.
leases.peopleOnLeaseInfo4: Landlord information is required for legal purposes.
leases.additionalOccupantsQuestion: Will there be any additional occupants?
leases.additionalOccupantsDescription: Please list all additional occupants who will reside at the property.
leases.differentAddressQuestion: Will the manager or owner have a mailing address that differs from the rental property address:
leases.provisionAttachmentDescription: Add custom clauses, rules or provisions specific to your property and/or local area.
leases.additionalTermsQuestion: Are there any additional terms you'd like to add to this agreement?
leases.additionalTermsDesc1: Add any custom clauses or rules that apply to your property.
leases.additionalTermsDesc2: These terms will be included in the final agreement.
leases.additionalTermsDesc3: Consult with a legal professional for complex provisions.
leases.attachmentsDesc1: Upload any supporting documents or images related to your property.
leases.propertyConditionReportDesc: Attach a property condition report to document the state of the property at the start of the lease.

selectLeaseAddendum.title: Select Lease for Addendum
selectLeaseAddendum.intro: Choose the type of addendum you want to create.
selectLeaseAddendum.commonReasonsTitle: The most common reasons for using an addendum are:
selectLeaseAddendum.easyToFillDesc: Our forms are simple and quick to complete.
selectLeaseAddendum.legalConfidenceDesc: Stay compliant with up-to-date legal requirements.
selectLeaseAddendum.fastToSignDesc: Send and sign addendums digitally in minutes.
